# Deployment architecture

- Boxes/rectangles are horizontally scaling pods, minimum 1
- `cloud function / lambdas` are stateless, ideally should be GCP `cloud functions` or AWS `lambdas`
- Lines without arrows indicate BOTH directions are needed (both services require access to each other)
- Services starting with `@` are docker image artifacts published from the `./app` directory
  - Other services are pulled from public registries

```mermaid
graph LR
    pod["horizontally scaling pod"]
    lambda[/"cloud function / lambda"/]
    database[(database)]
    auth["@auth"]
    browser(["@browser"])
    graphql["@graphql"]
    db[("postgresql (rds)")]
    api_private[/"@api-private"/]
    vouch[/"vouch"/]
    browser-->|app.host.com/index.html|auth
    browser-->|graphql.app.host.com|graphql
    browser-->|oauth.app.host.com|vouch
    subgraph app.host.com
    vouch
    auth---|/v1/graphql|graphql
    graphql-->db
    graphql---api_private
    api_private-->db
    end
```

[diagram](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#)
